activity_roster_start.description:
Welcome to the activity roster setup.
Please select an activity type.

fields.name: :one: Vanguard <:grandmaster:843042055697596417>
fields.value: Fight against combatants in three-man Vanguard operations.

fields.name: :two: Crucible <:crucible:843041980770025492>
fields.value: Test your might against other Guardians in the Crucible or Trials.

fields.name: :three: Gambit <:gambit:843041954900082698>
fields.value: Battle combatants and other Guardians in the quasi-legal engagements of the Drifter's Gambit.

fields.name: :four: Raids <:vault_of_glass:843040539045920799>
fields.value: Confront the enemies of humanity in a six-man fireteam raid activity.

fields.name: :five: Seasonal <:splicer:843042032079339550>
fields.value: Take part in seasonal activities; fight for the allies of humanity and for the Last City.

activity_roster_vanguard.description:
Fight against combatants in three-man Vanguard operations.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: Playlist Strikes
fields.value: Create a team of three Guardians and take on the Strike playlist.

fields.name: :two: Nightfall: The Ordeal
fields.value: Defeat the enemies of humanity in the weekly Nightfall.

fields.name: :three: Grandmaster Nightfall
fields.value: Work your way through the hardest missions the Vanguard has to offer. Good luck.

activity_roster_crucible.desciption: Test your might against other Guardians in the Crucible or Trials.

fields.name: :one: Control
fields.value: Capture and defend zones in a 6v6 PvP activity.

fields.name: :two: Weekly Rotation
fields.value: Join the 3v3 or 6v6 rotating gamemodes such as Mayhem or Momentum Control

fields.name: :three: Trials of Osiris
fields.value: Engage in the card-based 3v3 Trials of Osiris and earn exclusive weapons and Flawless rewards.

fields.name: :four: Private Match
fields.value: Invite others to play a private Crucible match, with a gamemode and map of your choosing.

activity_roster_raid.description: Confront the enemies of humanity in a six-man fireteam raid activity.

fields.name: :one: Vault of Glass
fields.value: Make your own fate by fighting through the underbelly of Venus to defeat Atheon, Time's Conflux.

fields.name: :two: Deep Stone Crypt
fields.value: Uncover the legacy of the Bray family, and defend Europa against the remnants of House Salvation.

fields.name: :three: Garden of Salvation
fields.value: Follow the Darkness's signal into the Black Garden to defeat the Sanctified Mind, Sol Inherent.

fields.name: :four: Last Wish
fields.value: Venture into the heart of the Dreaming City to free Savath√ªn's captives and slay the Taken Ahamkara, Riven of a Thousand Voices.
